data.message: is it true that facebook is deactivating people who did not send the chain message???

replies.message: Hey Jai. Facebook is free and it always will be. Learn more: http://bit.ly/1s1CSmV. -Rey
Thanks. i received 2 messages it says taht if i did not send that to 25 other person my account would be deactivated after 24 hours

hai! dear jai. how are you?i am rohan from srilanka.i whould like to chat with you.i am working as a ex.chef at arugambay      .garden cottage hotel.arugambay sri-lanka.are you working.please reply me.
